Generated Narrative: ValueSet ClinicalProtocolCodes

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in https://kip.rkkp.dk/fhir/CodeSystem/ClinicalProtocolCodes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    mrc_18MRC-18MRC-18 protocol
  • Include these codes as defined in https://kip.rkkp.dk/fhir/CodeSystem/GenericValues
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    otherAndenOther - used to choose unspecific value not in a valueset
